Question.Subject: itunes cannot connect,neither can msn or avg or anything!?
Question.Content: every time i try to download itunes or avg or msn or lime wire etc i get message telling me i have no internet connection, which i obviously have as i can access everything else online i just cant download anything. i have tried doing a system reset, tried disabling the firewall in my laptop and my router, tried clearing the cache tried everything. please can someone tell me what to do to fix this. im running vista business, on a toshiba pro Satellite laptop with a virgin modem and netgear router. on broadband. i have been trying to fix this for 6 months! hi thanks. ihave tried all those previously and they dont work, and as for firefox, i cant download it as i get the not connected to the internet message!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi, so this has been happening for the last 6 months ??
please check this :- your systems firewall settings your admin rights (you are an admin on your system) your routers firewall settings
what else !!!!
also scan your system with malwarebytes for mailware http://malwarebytes.org/
install firefox and use that to download (look in the update box if it blocks the download) are you on an Internal internet system which you have limited rights (works system)
hope this all helps you if you
update :- use a friends system to download firefox (use filehippo site) onto a USB flash drive then install it from the flash drive back onto your system now when you download a file etc look at the bottom left corner status bar and find out WHY you are blocked
hope this helps again

Answer.Content:
Hi, so this has been happening for the last 6 months ??
please check this :- your systems firewall settings your admin rights (you are an admin on your system) your routers firewall settings
what else !!!!
also scan your system with malwarebytes for mailware http://malwarebytes.org/
install firefox and use that to download (look in the update box if it blocks the download) are you on an Internal internet system which you have limited rights (works system)
hope this all helps you if you
update :- use a friends system to download firefox (use filehippo site) onto a USB flash drive then install it from the flash drive back onto your system now when you download a file etc look at the bottom left corner status bar and find out WHY you are blocked
hope this helps again
